Articles.Content:
I finally created a forum account and I just thought I'd say hi. I've been playing since (some time) before .13 and bought the game literally hours before .18 rolled out. Love the game, and I love what SQUAD's doing with it.

I'd also like to say that having a proper launcher is awesome and that I'm glad I don't have to mess around with .zip files any more.

/me goes back to lurking
50+ views and nobody said hi back yet? I guess I'll be the first to write hello back at ya. Welcome.
